get.description: Returns all registered people and the name of the team they are assigned to

post.description: POST a new Person. For the request to be met, the "nome_pessoa", "funcao_pessoa", "equipe_id" are required.

put.description: PUT a specific person. For the request to be met, the "nome_pessoa" and "funcao_pessoa" and "equipe_id" are required

get.description: GET the tasks registered and assigned to a specific person
get.summary: GET All Tasks of a specific Person

post.description: POST a new project. For the request to be met, the "nome_projeto", "equipe_id", "descricao_projeto" are required. The status already goes with a predefined value "A Fazer". the "prazo_entrega" is the number of days that the delivery time will be

get.description: GET all registered projects that have the status passed as a parameter
get.summary: Get Status of Projects with a specific status with Param Status

get.description: GET a project with a specific ID

put.description: PUT a specific project. For the request to be met, the "nome_projeto" and "equipe_id" and "descricao_projeto" are required

delete.description: DELETE a specific project. For the request to be met, the "id_projeto" are required

put.description: PUT Status of a specific project. For the request to be met, the "status" are required

get.description: GET all tasks of a project with ID_Projeto specific
get.summary: Get Tasks of Project with Param ID

post.description: POST a new task. For the request to be met, the "descricao_task", "pessoa_id", "projeto_id", "prazo_entrega(in days)", "prioridade" are required. The status already goes with a predefined value "A Fazer". the "prazo_entrega" is the number of days that the delivery time will be

get.description: GET All tasks with a specific status. "Em Andamento" or "Concluido"
Get a specific task with id

put.description: PUT a specific task. For the request to be met, the "descricao_task" and "pessoa_id" and "projeto_id" and "prioridade" are required.
PUT Status of a specific Task. For the request to be met, the "status" are required
